snippet.title: Detector Island: A Metal Detecting Game - Official GAMEPLAY Trailer
snippet.description:
You walk around on an island digging up random bits of metal objects. Most of the time you'll find trash, but the most rewarding feeling is when you find treasure. These objects earn a varying number of points, depending on what the object comes out as, which you can use to buy skins or upgrades for your detector. Listen to calming music as you take in the island's unique scenery. What can you dig up?

Links to get Detector Island:
https://chompiv.itch.io/detectorisland
https://gamejolt.com/games/detectorisland/354861

Feel free to re-upload this trailer! Just remember to provide links to the download :). Here's the trailer: 
http://www.mediafire.com/file/aup5d1cb4vr8dbu/Gameplay_Trailer.mp4/file

Other Trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qCq6zNpneKM

https://www.reddit.com/r/DetectorIsland/
https://twitter.com/DetectorIsland

Link to the DevLogs:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLo3eDdyP5WLNBXS7M_9VoZs_gQJfXrNzf

https://twitter.com/ChompIV
